languages.text: "Звенит-звенит звоночек в голове-е-е-е..." {n}Идира прикрывает ладонями уши и с силой зажмуривается.{/n} "В месте, из которого еще никто не возвращался, сидит тень того, кто и жив, и мертв одновременно... Голоса отчаянно зовут меня туда, но почему, ПОЧЕМУ?"

traits.locale_text: "Звенит-звенит звоночик в голове-е-е-е..." {n}Идира прикрывает ладонями уши и с силой зажмуривается.{/n} "В месте, из которого еще никто не возвращался, сидит тень того, кто и жив, и мертв одновременно... Голоса очтаянно зовут меня туда, но почему, ПОЧЕМУ?"

languages.text: "Something's calling, it's calling, and calling..." {n}Idira covers her ears with her palms and forces her eyes shut.{/n} "There, in the place of no return, sits the shadow of one who is both alive and dead at once... The voices are calling me there, calling so desperately, but why? WHY?"
languages.original_text: "Звенит-звенит звоночек в голове-е-е-е..." {n}Идира прикрывает ладонями уши и с силой зажмуривается.{/n} "В месте, из которого еще никто не возвращался, сидит тень того, кто и жив, и мертв одновременно... Голоса отчаянно зовут меня туда, но почему, ПОЧЕМУ?"

traits.locale_text: "Ringing, ringing is the bell in the he-e-e-a-a-ad..."{n}Idira covers her ears with her palms and forces her eyes shut.{/n} "In the place from whence nobody has ever come back sits the shadow of the one who is both alive and dead at once... The voices are desperate for me to go there, but why, WHY?"

"Ringing, ringing is the bell in the he-e-e-a-a-ad..."{n}Idira covers her ears with her palms and forces her eyes shut.{/n} "In the place from whence nobody has ever come back sits the shadow of the one who is both alive and dead at once... The voices are desperate for me to go there, but why, WHY?"

The voices are desperate for me to go there, but why, WHY?"

"Ringing, ringing is the bell in the he-e-e-a-a-ad..."{n}Idira covers her ears with her palms and forces her eyes shut.{/n} "In the place from whence nobody has ever come back sits the shadow of the one who is both alive and dead at once... The voices are desperate for me to go there, but why, WHY?"

"Something's calling, it's calling, and calling..." {n}Idira covers her ears with her palms and forces her eyes shut.{/n} "There, in the place of no return, sits the shadow of one who is both alive and dead at once... The voices are calling me there, calling so desperately, but why? WHY?"

"Something's calling, it's calling, and calling..." {n}Idira covers her ears with her palms and forces her eyes shut.{/n} "There, in the place of no return, sits the shadow of one who is both alive and dead at once... The voices are calling me there, calling so desperately, but why? WHY?"

languages.text: «Algo me llama. Me llama y me llama...». {n}Idira se tapa los oídos con las manos y cierra con fuerza los ojos.{/n} «Allí, en el lugar del que nadie ha regresado, yace la sombra de quien está vivo y muerto a un tiempo... Las voces quieren desesperadamente que yo vaya allí, pero ¿por qué? ¿POR QUÉ?».
languages.original_text: "Something's calling, it's calling, and calling..." {n}Idira covers her ears with her palms and forces her eyes shut.{/n} "There, in the place of no return, sits the shadow of one who is both alive and dead at once... The voices are calling me there, calling so desperately, but why? WHY?"

traits.locale_text: «Tañe, tañe la campana en la cabe-e-e-za-a-aa...».{n}Idira se tapa los oídos con las palmas de las manos y cierra los ojos apretando los párpados.{/n} «En el lugar del que nadie ha regresado jamás yace la sombra de aquél que está al mismo tiempo vivo y muerto... Las voces quieren desesperadamente que yo vaya allí, ¿pero por qué? ¿POR QUÉ?».

languages.text: “有什么东西在呼唤我，呼唤我，响个不停……”{n}伊迪拉用手掌捂住双耳，努力闭上眼睛。{/n}“在某个无人返回的地方，坐着某人的影子。那个人同时处于生与死的状态……那些声音呼唤着我，声音是那么渴切，可为什么？为什么？”
languages.original_text: "Something's calling, it's calling, and calling..." {n}Idira covers her ears with her palms and forces her eyes shut.{/n} "There, in the place of no return, sits the shadow of one who is both alive and dead at once... The voices are calling me there, calling so desperately, but why? WHY?"

traits.locale_text: “那些声音……一直在我的脑子……脑子里……呃啊啊……”{n}伊迪拉用手掌捂住双耳，努力闭上眼睛。{/n}“在某个无人返回的地方，坐着某人的影子。那个人同时处于生与死的状态……那些声音迫切希望我去那个地方，但为什么，为什么？”

languages.text: « Quelque chose m'appelle, encore et encore... » {n}Idira ferme les yeux et se met les mains sur les oreilles.{/n} « À l'endroit d'où personne n'est jamais revenu se trouve l'ombre de quelqu'un qui est à la fois mort et vivant... Les voix me supplient de m'y rendre, mais pourquoi ? POURQUOI ? »
languages.original_text: "Something's calling, it's calling, and calling..." {n}Idira covers her ears with her palms and forces her eyes shut.{/n} "There, in the place of no return, sits the shadow of one who is both alive and dead at once... The voices are calling me there, calling so desperately, but why? WHY?"

traits.locale_text: « Quelque chose m'appelle, encore et encore... » {n}Idira ferme les yeux et se met les mains sur les oreilles.{/n} « À l'endroit d'où personne n'est jamais revenu se trouve l'ombre de quelqu'un qui est à la fois mort et vivant... Les voix me supplient de m'y rendre, mais pourquoi ? POURQUOI ? »

languages.text: 「何かが呼んでいる。呼んでいる。呼んでいるの…」{n}イディラは手のひらで耳を覆い、目を閉じる。{/n}「誰も戻ってきたことのない場所に、生きていると同時に死んでいる者の影が座っている…声は私にそこへ行くことを強く求めている。でも、どうして。どうしてなの？」
languages.original_text: "Something's calling, it's calling, and calling..." {n}Idira covers her ears with her palms and forces her eyes shut.{/n} "There, in the place of no return, sits the shadow of one who is both alive and dead at once... The voices are calling me there, calling so desperately, but why? WHY?"

traits.locale_text: 「何かが呼んでいる。呼んでいる。呼んでいるの…」{n}イディラは手のひらで耳を覆い、目を閉じる。{/n}「誰も戻ってきたことのない場所に、生きていると同時に死んでいる者の影が座っている…声は私にそこへ行くことを強く求めている。でも、どうして。どうしてなの？」

languages.text: "Etwas ruft, es ruft und ruft ..." {n} Idira hält sich die Ohren zu und schließt ihre Augen.{/n} "Dort, am Ort ohne Wiederkehr, sitzt der Schatten dessen, der lebendig und tot zugleich ist ... Die Stimmen rufen mich dorthin. Sie klingen so verzweifelt, aber warum? WARUM?"
languages.original_text: "Something's calling, it's calling, and calling..." {n}Idira covers her ears with her palms and forces her eyes shut.{/n} "There, in the place of no return, sits the shadow of one who is both alive and dead at once... The voices are calling me there, calling so desperately, but why? WHY?"

traits.locale_text: "Klong, klong, klong tönt die Glocke im Ko-o-o-o-opf ..."{n} Idira hält sich beide Ohren zu und schließt fest die Augen.{/n} "An dem Ort, von dem noch nie jemand zurückgekehrt ist, sitzt der Schatten des einen, der lebendig und tot zugleich ist ... Die Stimmen drängen darauf, dass ich dort hingehe, doch warum, WARUM?"

languages.text: "Bir şey çağırıyor. Çağırıyor ve devam ediyor..." {n}İdira, avuçlarını kulaklarına siper yaparak gözlerini sıkı sıkıya kapatıyor.{/n} "Orada, o gidenin geri dönmediği yerde hem ölü hem de diri olanın gölgesi uzanıyor... Sesler beni oraya çağırıyor. O kadar umutsuzca çağırıyorlar ki... Ama neden? NEDEN?"
languages.original_text: "Something's calling, it's calling, and calling..." {n}Idira covers her ears with her palms and forces her eyes shut.{/n} "There, in the place of no return, sits the shadow of one who is both alive and dead at once... The voices are calling me there, calling so desperately, but why? WHY?"
